means: 起皱的，绉褶多的，卷缩的

sentence.Network_en: His crinkly hair was touched with grey.
sentence.Network_cn: 他卷曲的头发有些花白。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 基础英语单词汇锦 - 豆丁网 ... head v. 位于…的顶部；带领 crinkly a. （衣服）起皱的 Still a. attic n. 顶楼，阁楼.

list.abs: 进出口专业英语词汇(C8) ... crinkled yarn 卷缩纱 crinkly cloth 绉纹织物 Crinol 克林诺尔粘胶单丝.

entry.def: A crinkly object has many small creases or folds in it or in its surface.

example.tran: 她那张满是皱纹的大脸

auth_sentence.content: Her eyes went all crinkly and happy again.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Her eyes went all crinkly and happy again.

auth_sentence.content: Tony read the letter over breakfast and shook his copy noisily at me newsprint was crinkly and loud back then.

auth_sentence.content: The slender and well-proportioned young bartender with naturally crinkly black hair is standing right there.
